name: PriceMap.co
tag_list: price, prices, ad, sefl-serve-ad-platfom, advertising, global, local, marketing
overview:
PriceMap.co is the main address for project PriceMap. PriceMap is a self-serve ad platform, where companies publish their prices. PriceMap also exist in other countries by fitting to local language: PriceMap.co (US, Canada, Columbia) PriceMap.co.uk (United Kingdom) PriceMap.in (India) PriceMap.eu (just to show Europe) PriceMap.es (Spain) PriceMap.be (Belgium) PriceMap.ch (Switzerland) PriceMap.it (Italy) PriceMap.at (Austria) PriceMap.nl (Netherlands) PriceMap.lu (Luxembourg) PriceMap.se (Sweden) PriceMap.ae CENOmapa.pl (Poland) PrixCarte.fr (France) PreiseKarte.de (Germany) HargaPeta.com (Indonesia and Malaysia) FiyatHarita.com (Turkey) PrecosMapa.com (Brazil and Portugal)

In 4Q of 2011 project PriceMap is in pre-launch stage, which is inviting network companies to become familiar with this new way of advertising.

PriceMap aims to reach not only home computers but also smartphones. Apps for iPhone and Android will be ready in 3Q 2012.
